SignOut.Description: Are you sure you want to sign out? You will need to sign in again to access your account.

NotFound.Title: Oops! Page Not Found!
NotFound.Description: It seems like the page you're looking for does not exist or might have been removed.

GeneralError.Apologize: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again later.

Settings.Description: Manage your account settings and set app preferences.

ForgotPassword.Title: Forgot Password
ForgotPassword.Description: Enter your registered email and we will send you a link to reset your password.

Profile.Description: This is how others will see you on the site.

Username.Description: This is your public display name. You can only change this once every 30 days.

Validation.Min: Username must be at least 2 characters.
Validation.Max: Username must not be longer than 30 characters.

Email.Placeholder: Select a verified email to display
Email.Description: You can manage verified email addresses in your email settings.

Validation.Empty: Please select an email to display.

Bio.Placeholder: Tell us a little bit about yourself
Bio.Description: You can @mention other users and organizations to link to them.

Validation.Max: Too long: expected string to have <= 120 characters

Appearance.Description: Customize the appearance of the app. Automatically switch between day and night themes.

Font.Description: Set the font you want to use in the app.

Theme.Description: Select the theme for the app.

Locale.Description: Select the locale for the app.
